featured.text: The researchers found that children who had cooked their own foods were more likely to eat those foods in the cafeteria than children who had not.
John’s part-time experience at the cafeteria is good for running his own restaurant.
The children whose parents work in a cafeteria. 55.

definition.zh_def: 自助餐廳，通常在學校、辦公室或其他公共場所提供餐飲服務的地方。
definition.en_def: A self-service restaurant or dining area, often found in schools, offices, or public places, where food is served.
definition.example: The students gathered in the cafeteria for lunch.
